subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: George Smith, a 23-year-old senior for Vanderbilt, has made a remarkable recovery from transverse myelitis, a neurological disorder caused by inflammation of the spinal cord.
snippet: George Smith, a 23-year-old senior for Vanderbilt, has made a remarkable recovery from transverse myelitis, a neurological disorder caused by inflammation of the spinal cord.
